product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Titan Cot - Large - Special Buy
long_description: Get a good night's sleep even when you're away from home. The large ALPS Mountaineering Titan cot has angled legs to prevent rocking and a center telescoping leg that offers stability and support. Powder-coated aluminum frame is reinforced with steel connectors and covered with 600-denier polyester fabric. Handy storage pocket stows glasses, keys and a flashlight. Cot measures 81 x 30 in. Folds up into a 41 x 8 x 5 in. carry/storage bag. Special buy.
short_description: Get a good night's sleep even when you're away from home. The large ALPS Mountaineering Titan cot has angled legs to prevent rocking and a center telescoping leg that offers stability and support.
